Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: The market-platform does not have an orderbook as a traditional cryptocurrency exchange. Sell orders are done in bulk for a fixed price (not applicable for third market offerings). Everybody can buy the token for the quoted price, not resulting in manipulating the price. Once the supply is sold, the offering closes. Transactions are done peer to peer, meaning that 1 entity sells to another entity directly, anonymous, decentralized. Funds are not stored on the platform. The project owners themselves do not control if their token is sold on Vertex.Market but only the token holders themselves. In the world of tokenization and blockchain, Vertex.Market removes any sort of offline process and let’s exchange whoever wants to exchange digital asset with whomever wants to buy it.

Body: The benefits, of our token VTEX: 1.) ICO buyers: Preferential pricing on the Vertex platform and a fair system that gives every user  the opportunity to buy into any of the projects offered for sale on the platform. 2.) ICOs: Early buy ins that inject funds into the ICO, expose the project to a pool of users that have already conducted KYC. 3.) ICO Vetting: Rigorous 6-step process, this will contribute towards raising the quality levels of the projects that are launched in general. Find out more at https://vertex.market

Author: mitalo
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: The aim is to create a token that will be used to underpin the ICO investment economy. In other words, Vertex is looking to leverage its expertise to vet ICOs, buying into the ones it deems the most likely to succeed.

Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: The main function of the Platform is to execute the following: o Listing of ICOs. o Rating of ICOs and comments by the Vertex team of analysts and Private Equity investors. o Explanation and full declaration of evaluation steps that have been done and why any particular ICO has passed/complied with these tests. o “Buy in” functionality where users can buy tokens and have them directly sent to their wallets. o Purchase of Vertex Tokens to invest in other ICOs. o Users will be able to see upcoming “final stage” ICOs Vertex is evaluating. And these are some of Vertexes main goals: o To create a financial ecosystem that will ensure a high-end, profitable market for investments in cryptocurrency, through its platform. o To provide investors with strong opportunities to get returns and bring more fiat resources into cryptocurrency markets, by attracting capital through its ICO vetting mechanisms and its investors. o To offer tokens before they are listed on exchanges, the moment an ICO is over.

Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥

Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: Vertex Hard-cap announcement. Vertex is the first ICO aftermarket, an ecosystem facilitating in the growth of ICOs, those who participate in ICOs and the cryptocurrency ecosystem. Vertex has created a unique token that will allow holders the opportunity to buy into sold-out ICOs or highly valued projects they missed through the use of the VTEX token. The community will be able to buy all the best tokens through one market entry point, Vertex. The project has achieved a lot in many aspects but was recently limited from starting our ICO. Another feature that has been changed due to the decline in markets is the hard cap. The Vertex hard cap dropped in order to accommodate for the low markets and those who have lost capital in the current conditions.  GET YOUR VTEX From $44.7 Million to $18 Million, Vertex has taken a significant leap in allowing the community to benefit more from the economy the token has and will create, continually accommodating to the needs of the market and their community. By joining Vertex, you would be doubling down on, both helping the project grow as well as your crypto portfolio balance through what VTEX token allows you to achieve on its Marketplace. We pride ourselves in offering the community more; from an abundance of exclusive token offerings, preferential rates and hidden token competitions. With Vertex, you will always be ensured the best platform, tokens, and opportunities; buy your VTEX tokens on the first of October, there’s only $18 Million worth of tokens: https://vertex.market/ https://medium.com/@official_83664/vertex-hard-cap-announcement-446cfec46eb8

Author: Thishastoend
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: That still doesn't answer my question though? Why would anyone invest in ICOs when they can just buy on Vertex? Also your team will obviously profit on reselling tokens, which you would get at a lesser price, and then sell on your own market, but knowing that it will offput private investors even more basically dumping ICO token price below what early birds paid on psale, which means nobody would even want to buy at that point. You may say that you will be selling psale tokens on your market to counter that, but that actually is even worse, it invalidates a point of psale completely. And invalidates ICO to a point of irrelevance, which is the end removes your project from the market because its only usecase(reselling ICOs) stops existing. How are you going to address this issue?

Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥

Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: How to Fix ICO Markets? Scams, failed projects and concepts that cannot be realistically implemented. Put all those together with a handful of sensible, strong and feasible projects and you have a complete picture about how the ICO markets look on the surface. Scratch the surface to take a deeper look and you will find an industry rife with pseudo-advisers, sites that get paid for reviewing projects positively, outlets that attract traffic but can’t be bothered to engage in deeper analysis, and a handful of people and sites that understand that these dynamics must change. ICO markets are problematic. Encouraging the teams behind those strong projects as well as the few people and the sites that are promoting healthy criticism from within, is the only feasible path to fix ICO markets. https://medium.com/@official_83664/how-to-fix-ico-markets-6410d4eda8d1

Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: Sure, as you may know, many ICO tracking sites and advisors accept payments for better ratings which makes it hard for inexperienced investors to differentiate the good from the bad.  We negate this because of the fact that we rigorously vet the project and will only list a project on our platform when we invest in the project ourselves (We will always invest a minimum of $500 000 into a project that we plan to list on our platform.)

Author: Vertex_ICO
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🔥Vertex Marketplace - The worlds first token Aftermarket. 🔥
Body: Vertex.Market | Whitepaper | 2-Pager | Register | Facebook | Twitter | Medium | YouTube | Github  Vertex A UNIQUE ECOSYSTEM FOR INVESTORS, THE COMMUNITY AND ICOS The world's first ICO aftermarket  WHO are WE? Vertex is a decentralized Token Market and the first ICO aftermarket in the world. Vertex offers OTC ICO tokens before they are listed on exchanges for a preferential price. Listed tokens will also be for sale on Vertex for a lower price than on the exchanges.  Vertex is a consortium of investors, traders, VCs and developers that have taken action to form a new ICO investment ecosystem and offer it to the public.  Our vision Our vision is to create an ecosystem within the ICO market to increase its reputation and help non-accredited investors to invest in this thriving market. Vertex will become THE aftermarket and source for tokens either  1.) For non-listed utility and security tokens 2.) Tokens that are not listed yet but will be soon 3.) Listed tokens  Vertex is a major player. The Vertex market attracts Funds and Venture capitalists and offers them an exit of an ICO, without the need to sell the tokens on an exchange and hurting the project. On the other side, it attracts hundreds of thousands of users that want to buy evaluated, great tokens for a lower price then it was sold, or it is traded on exchanges.  Vertex Public Sale Info START DATE 01.10.2018  END DATE 15.02.2019   MARKET  The market platform grants users access to sold-out ICO tokens or ICO tokens that are no longer for sale without the need to be listed on cryptocurrency exchanges. The users will benefit from preferential prices and allow them to buy into highly evaluated, promising tokens.  The market is decentralized and all a user has to do is transfer VTEX tokens from his wallet of choice to an address given by the tool. Vertex validates if the sender address is registered for this user and once validated, the tokens will be sent directly to his wallet.  Vertex.market will change the way the ICO lifecycle works. The Investment consortium behind vertex has high liquidity but will continuously onboard other Funds, VCs and Family offices to join the ecosystem and increase the overall liquidity.  WHY VERTEX WORKS  01.) Time to Exchange ICOs that closed their public funding (if applicable) will increasingly have longer between the end of ICO and their exchange listing. This is a good development since there is no logical reason, a freshly funded business should be subject to speculation. Vertex.Market fills this gap  2.) Exchange, not the right instrument An exchange is a place where established business should be traded, not a 5-month-old start-up. However, contributors that missed the crowd-sale, now have the opportunity to buy these tokens at preferential prices before it launches on an exchange.  3.) Exit door for VC’s and Funds If an ICO did not plan to get listed on exchanges, most VC’s and Capital Investors would not perform an investment because they don’t have an exit-door. Vertex.Market offers the perfect exit-door, without pressuring the price of the token.  4.) A boost for every ICO Every ICO would like to be evaluated, listed and provided with investments. The Vertex platform has high liquidity through its investors and partners.  The Vertex vetting process rules out scams and projects that are not yet ready, which in turn gives contributors and Vertex token holders a clear advantage in the market.  5.) All Private Sale ICOs Many ICOs that have a high chance of success are usually not sold publicly, which means ordinary people would not get access to these tokens at ICO prices. The Vertex Platform changes this by buying into successfully vetted ICOs in private sale phase and then offering the tokens to the public on the Vertex.Market platform. The Vertex token market will be the first ICO aftermarket which offers ICOs investment opportunities or access to its investment consortium, which is a substantial advantage that is more than just an investment.  The community gains a new instrument and a new way of buying ICO tokens they can trust, for lower cost.  Funds and VCs finally get a second way of selling part of their investment and no longer have to force the ICO to conduct a fast exchange listing and buyback of their own tokens. Meet the team!  Alessandro Pecorelli CEO  Abdullah Al Othaim President of Vertex Capital  Fahad Al Rajhi Head of Business Development  Saud Al Jomaih CIO  Investors  Naif Al Rajhi Investor & Partner  Mohammed Al Othaim Investor & Partner  Abdulaziz Bin Sultan Investor  Sulaiman Al Rajhi Investor & Partner   Roadmap  July 2, 2018 Private Sale  October 01 2018 Public Sale  October 29 2018 Launch alpha version  January 15, 2018 Launch of Vertex BUYBACK  February 15, 2019 Closure of Public Sale  March 5 2019 VTEX Premium Security Token  June 03 2019 Launch of Release 3  October 01 2019 First vertex.market exclusive ICO’s  December 01 2019 Round 2 Vertex Premium Token   BUDGET ALLOCATION  3 000 000  Business Development 25%  Partners 10%  Legal & expenses 10%  Software Development 30%  Operational 15%  Reinvestment 10%   11 000 000  Business Development 20%  Partners 10%  Legal & expenses 8%  Software Development 20%  Operational 12%  Reinvestment 30%  21 000 000  Business Development 14%  Partners 10%  Legal & expenses 8%  Software Development 15%  Operational 10%  Reinvestment 43% 31 000 000  Business Development 12%  Partners 10%  Legal & expenses 8%  Software Development 12%  Operational 8%  Reinvestment 50% 40 000 000  Business Development 11%  Partners 10%  Legal & expenses 7%  Software Development 11%  Operational 7%  Reinvestment 54%   Vertex ICO & Vertex TOKEN DISTRIBUTION  Token Sale 60% Public & Private sale  12% Limited Company  5% Bounty Program  8% Strategic partners   15% Team & Investors  JOIN US!!!   Vertex.Market | Whitepaper | 2-Pager | Register | Facebook | Twitter | Medium | YouTube | Github

Maybe we will open this in a future phase but for first release, its institutionals to public only since mostly only institutional have very low entries.
